title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Strategies for Improving Mathematical Job Performance Through Workplace Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply math problem-solving strategies for job-related situations with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations.
Learners can connect three or more personal learning goals with organizational objectives by creating a workplace learning plan.
Learners can propose two or more math-based job performance improvement plans based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
